auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetPasswordSent: A password reset email has been sent to your address. Please check your inbox.
auth.emailConfirmationRequired: Please confirm your email before logging in.
auth.confirmationEmailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to your address.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

hero.title: Your on-demand Sage X3 expert!
hero.subtitle: Buy yourself peace of mind and bring AI to the center of your ERP safely and securely.

features.title: A Complete and Integrated Solution
features.subtitle: Transform your Sage X3 experience with our 4-in-1 solution that revolutionizes how your teams interact with your information system.

support.title: Intelligent Support
support.description: Automatic problem resolution via chat for all users in a page integrated with Sage X3. 24/7 assistance with contextual responses.

training.title: Personalized Training
training.description: Continuous skill development for users through guided training and Q&A adapted to their level and specific needs.

tips.title: Daily Tips
tips.description: Automated 'What's new in Sage X3' to remind users of basic features and new system possibilities.

evolution.title: Automated Evolutions
evolution.description: Ready-to-install patches based on user evolution suggestions. Continuous improvement of your Sage X3 environment.

circle.title: A system that continuously improves
circle.subtitle: Our AI creates a virtuous circle of continuous improvement that transforms your Sage X3 into a self-optimized system with increasingly autonomous teams.

examples.title: See the Magic Happen
examples.subtitle: Watch how our AI could help you
examples.demoQuestion: I can't validate my delivery, the following message appears: Order not deliverable: Customer on hold.
examples.demoResponse: This message appears in order picking, delivery request or direct delivery creation if the billed customer is blocked. It is then impossible to create the delivery, except for an order that has been unblocked by an authorized user.

chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your Sage X3 assistant. How can I help you today?
chat.placeholder: Type your question about Sage X3...

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for you and your team. Start optimizing your Sage X3 today.
pricing.footer: As we are performance-conscious, we have implemented a waiting list to manage our server resources. We will keep you regularly updated on your position in the queue.
